articles.description: Vasek’s change in status was the only alteration to the injury report for the Longhorns on Friday.
articles.content:
The No. 5 Texas Longhorns will be without redshirt freshman edge Colton Vasek on Saturday against the Florida Gators in Austin, according to the Friday injury report from the Longhorns.
Downgrading … [+626 chars]

articles.author: David Lombardi, Tim Kawakami
articles.title: 49ers vs. Buccaneers: The Standard’s 5 fast predictions - The San Francisco Standard
articles.description: The 49ers — coming off their bye — have a significant rest advantage against the Buccaneers, who will be playing on a short week.
articles.content: Lombardi: 49ers 34, Buccaneers 13Over the past three seasons, the 49ers have been a .500 before the bye week. But after the bye, they’ve posted a 30-8 record and topped the NFL across the efficiency … [+435 chars]
